scripts.postinstall: git clone -b marvel-branch https://github.com/boogheta/sigma.js.git && npm run buildsigma
scripts.buildsigma: cd sigma.js && npm install && npm run prepare && cd -
scripts.build: npm run buildsigma && kotatsu build client --config ./webpack.config.js --typescript index.ts --production -o build/bundle.js
scripts.buildgraphs: python bin/download_data.py && gzip -f data/Marvel_comics.csv && npm run preparegraphs && npm run aligngraphs
scripts.preparegraphs: ls data/*stories*.gexf | while read f; do node spatialize-network.js $f; echo; done
scripts.preparetestgraphs: ls data/*stories*.gexf | while read f; do node spatialize-network.js $f 100 100; echo; done
scripts.aligngraphs: node align-networks.js data/Marvel_characters_by_stories_full.json.gz data/Marvel_characters_by_stories.json.gz && node align-networks.js data/Marvel_creators_by_stories.json.gz data/Marvel_creators_by_stories_full.json.gz --mirror-x --mirror-y
